aboutPage.title: About Us
aboutPage.subtitle: Your trusted solution partner in the real estate industry since 2012

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: Founded in 2012, Bakırcılar Real Estate has been operating in the real estate industry for over 12 years. We offer services in a wide range from residential sales to commercial real estate management, from real estate consulting to investment analysis services.
story.paragraph2: By prioritizing customer satisfaction, we have become a trusted brand in the industry with reliable consulting and professional service approach. With our experienced real estate consultants and wide portfolio, we provide real estate solutions suitable for every budget.
story.paragraph3: With our transparent business approach, customer-oriented service methodology and sustainable real estate investment consulting, we act thinking about both today and the future.

aboutPage.visionDetailed: To become a leading consulting and sales company in the real estate industry by meeting constantly changing real estate demands at the highest level in the Turkish and regional market.
aboutPage.missionDetailed: To contribute to reaching your dream property by offering professional and customer-oriented real estate solutions without compromising our principles of quality, transparency and reliability.
aboutPage.valuesSubtitle: The core principles that shape our business processes
aboutPage.statsSubtitle: We are pioneers in the industry with years of experience and our strong team
